title: Vidhi Sakha
desc: Litigation management system for the Health Department, Govt. of Bihar.
fullDescription: Vidhi Sakha is a comprehensive litigation management system designed for the Health Department, Government of Bihar. It streamlines the tracking and management of legal cases, ensuring timely responses and effective monitoring of court matters. The portal provides secure access for officials to view case details, update statuses, and generate reports, thereby improving transparency and accountability in legal proceedings.

title: Jan Samadhan
desc: Public grievance and application tracking portal for Bhojpur.
fullDescription: Jan Samadhan is a citizen-centric web application designed for the public of Bhojpur. It empowers citizens to submit complaints and requests online and track their status. The system allows the administration to securely manage and resolve these cases, ensuring efficient public service delivery and grievance redressal.

title: MMUY Attendance Portal
desc: Biometric attendance tracking system for Mukhyamantri Udyami Yojana beneficiaries.
fullDescription: The MMUY Attendance Portal is a robust digital solution designed to ensure transparency and accountability in the Mukhyamantri Udyami Yojana training programs. It features real-time biometric tracking, secure login for administrators, and detailed reporting dashboards to monitor beneficiary attendance across various districts in Bihar.

title: HelloUdyami AI Chatbot
desc: AI-powered chatbot for 24/7 user assistance and query resolution.
fullDescription: HelloUdyami is an advanced AI-powered chatbot designed to provide instant support and guidance. It leverages natural language processing to understand user queries and deliver accurate, context-aware responses, significantly improving user engagement and support efficiency.

title: Bihar Heritage VR Experience
desc: Bringing the state’s heritage and architecture to virtual reality.
fullDescription: We have captured Bihar’s greatest monuments and historical sites in 360° VR, offering an immersive digital journey into the state's rich architectural legacy. This virtual reality experience allows global audiences to explore heritage sites remotely with stunning detail and realism.

title: N-IRIS (Nalanda Injury Report System)
desc: Transforming justice by reducing injury report generation time from months to days.
fullDescription: N-IRIS (Nalanda Injury Report Information System) is a transformative initiative designed to bring speed and fairness to the justice system. By replacing manual processes with a digital app, it has reduced the time for generating provisional injury reports from 6-10 months to just 2-3 days. Having processed over 10,000 reports, it empowers victims with real-time photographic evidence.
